title: Potatoes With Onions
directions: Melt margarine in a large skillet over medium heat; add onion, and cook 20 minutes or until golden, stirring often.
Add potato and remaining ingredients; cover, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes.
Uncover, increase heat to high, and simmer 3 to 5 additional minutes or until liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: 3medium yukon gold potatoes, unpeeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
1⁄2teaspoon minced fresh thyme(I use 1/8 tsp dried)
